QuestData.Title: Armor Scraps
QuestData.Description: Battles rage constantly in Alterac Valley, and the supplies we get from Ironforge are not enough to outfit our experienced troops.$B$BIf you find armor scraps from the battlefield, aid the war effort and bring those scraps to me!
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring 20 Armor Scraps to Murgot Deepforge in Dun Baldar.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you bring any armor scraps, $N?
QuestData.RewardText: These are some good pieces, $N. I can use them to fashion new equipment for our troops.$B$BIf my supply level gets high enough, then maybe our seasoned fighting units will enter the field!
